code: import axios from"axios";export var SET_CURRENCY="SET_CURRENCY";export var setCurrency=function setCurrency(){var currencyName=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:'PEN';return function(dispatch){axios.get("https://api.exchangeratesapi.io/latest?base=USD").then(function(response){var rates=response.data.rates;var currencyRate=0;for(var rate in rates){if(rate===currencyName){currencyRate=1;}}dispatch({type:SET_CURRENCY,payload:{currencyName:currencyName,currencyRate:currencyRate}});}).catch(function(err){console.log("Error: ",err);});};};
